File_Description: Data package level readme. Contains data package summary, acknowledgements, and contact information.
Standard: N/A

File_Description: Data dictionary defining column headers and other terms across the dataset.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021)

File_Description: File-level metadata that lists and describes all of the files contained in the dataset.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for File-level Metadata (Velliquette et al. 2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021)

File_Description: Description of methods associated with installation/deployment of sensors. Required by ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring (Goldman et al. 2021).
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata (Goldman et al. 2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021)

File_Description: This file maps between site ID and registered International Generic Sample Numbers (IGSNs). It conforms to the ESS-DIVE Sample ID and Metadata Reporting Format (IGSN-ESS) v1.1.0 (Damerow et al. 2020). Some information may be repeated between the field metadata file and this file.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Sample ID and Metadata (Damerow et al. 2020)

File_Description: Step-by-step instructions used to complete the sampling in the field.
Standard: N/A

File_Description: Step-by-step instructions used to complete sensor sampling in the field.
Standard: N/A

File_Description: Field metadata associated with the dataset.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021)

File_Description: Water chemistry data (specific conductance; pH; total dissolved solids; temperature) collected using an Ultrameter II 6PFCE with handheld sensor.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata (Goldman et al. 2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021)

File_Description: Time series data for barometric pressure and air temperature collect using In Situ Rugged BaroTROLL sensors for each sampling date and location. The asterisk * refers to the site ID, sampling location, and sampling date separated by underscores.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata (Goldman et al. 2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021)

File_Description: Summary statistics (e.g. mean; median; minimum; maximum) for BarotrollAtm data.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata (Goldman et al. 2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021)

File_Description: Time series plots for data from BarotrollAtm sensor for each sampling date and location.
Standard: N/A

File_Description: Time series data (depth; temperature; specific conductance; pH) collected using MantaRiver sensor for each sampling date and location. The asterisk * refers to the site ID, sampling location, and sampling date separated by underscores.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata (Goldman et al. 2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021)

File_Description: Time series plots for data from MantaRiver sensor for each sampling date and location.
Standard: N/A

File_Description: Summary statistics (e.g. mean; median; minimum; maximum) for MantaRiver data.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata (Goldman et al. 2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021)

File_Description: Time series data (temperature; dissolved oxygen; and dissolved oxygen saturation) collected using miniDOT sensor for each sampling date and location. The asterisk * refers to the site ID, sampling location, and sampling date separated by underscores.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata (Goldman et al. 2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021)

File_Description: Time series plots for data from miniDOT sensor for each sampling date and location.
Standard: N/A

File_Description: Summary statistics (e.g. mean; median; minimum; maximum; and slope; root mean square error or RMSE;  normalized root mean square error or NRMSE; R squared for dissolved oxygen only) for miniDOT data.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Hydrologic Monitoring Data and Metadata (Goldman et al. 2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021)

File_Description: Manual specifications for Manta. Refer to this document for data accuracy and precision.
Standard: N/A

File_Description: Manual specifications for BaroTROLL. Refer to this document for data accuracy and precision.
Standard: N/A

File_Description: Manual specifications for miniDOT. Refer to this document for data accuracy and precision.
Standard: N/A

File_Description: Manual specifications for Ultrameter. Refer to this document for data accuracy and precision.
Standard: N/A
